achievement.rsmm.join_meter_group.desc: Use the /metergroup command to subscribe to a meter group.
achievement.rsmm.open_keybinds_screen.de: Open the Controls screen from the options menu and scroll down to the Redstone Multimeter section.
achievement.rsmm.open_meter_controls.des: Open a meter's controls through the Multimeter screen or by looking at it and pressing the keybind
Open the Multimeter screen by pressing the keybind.
achievement.rsmm.open_options_screen.des: Open the options screen by pressing the keybind.
achievement.rsmm.pause_hud.desc: Pause the primary overview of the Multimeter HUD by pressing the keybind.
achievement.rsmm.place_meter.desc: Look at a block and place a meter by pressing the keybind.
achievement.rsmm.remove_meter.desc: Look at a meter and remove it by pressing the keybind.
achievement.rsmm.scroll_hud.desc: Use the Step Backwards and Step Forwards keybinds to scroll through the primary overview of the Multimeter HUD.
